PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Umbilical Cord Blood Confirmed HLA Typing

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Umbilical Cord Blood Confirmed HLA Typing
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Blood present in the umbilical vessels at the time of delivery. If cryopreserved at birth, cord blood can serve as a source of hematopoietic progenitor cells for transplantation to a patient later diagnosed and treated for a hematopoietic disorder.: Having been established or verified.: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Concepts.definition: Blood present in the umbilical vessels at the time of delivery. If cryopreserved at birth, cord blood can serve as a source of hematopoietic progenitor cells for transplantation to a patient later diagnosed and treated for a hematopoietic disorder.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2705055,  Biologic:typeCode
BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2705055, AssociatedBiologicEntity:typeCode, recipient
ReferenceDocuments.description: AssociatedBiologicEntity.typeCode("recipient", "recipient-mother", etc WHERE PerformedObservationResult > PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "Genetic Typing"

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2705055, AssociatedBiologicEntity:typeCode, mother
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedObservationResult > PerformedObservation > Subject [mother] > BiologicEntity[1] > AssociatedBiologcEntity.typeCode WHERE AssociatedBiologicEntity.typeCode = "mother" AND AssociatedBiologicEntity > BiologicEntity[2] > Subject [donor] > PerformedSubstanceExtraction > Biologic.typeCode = "cord blood"
